description.en: A planet called Ghost Star suddenly appeared, causing the earth's animals and plants to evolve into monsters that can destroy humans. At the time of human extinction, people accidentally discovered a way to log into the ghost star, and found that they could gain power against monsters on the ghost star. So in order to survive, human beings started the era of exploring ghost stars...

description.en:
**Warning:** This Spinoff manga has spoilers from the Light Novel.

After successfully completing the Founding Festival, which includes meetings with the leaders of various countries, a martial arts tournament, technology presentations, and the unveiling of the underground labyrinth, the peaceful daily life in Tempest has returned. Then, Veldora begins to say, "I'm also thinking of developing magic beasts", and the three of them, including Rimuru and Hinata, who are interested in developing new magic, head for the Magic Tower, the sacred place of magic...?

This work is based on the Light Novel, and the timeline is from the end of Volume 9 to the beginning of Volume 10.

description.en: Tenma has been stalking Uno on Instagram for the last 5 years and knows everything about him: a shopaholic, foodie, animal-lover and, above all, a kind man. Just watching Uno's stories every day fills Tenma with contentment—until a new girlfriend comes into the picture and makes him question everything that he thought he knew about Uno. Then, out of the blue, a heartbroken Tenma gets the shock of his life when Uno replies to one of his stories for the very first time.

description.en:
After learning 15 miserable years of his life as a failed gamer was one long nightmare, Lee Eojin is glad to be a newbie again! Vowing not to repeat the same mistakes, Eojin starts anew as the hotshot, Stagnant Water. 

He’s conquering monsters, getting sweet gear, and making enough dough to set himself up for life!

 Loved by fans and hated by foes, both old and new, will Eojin break the game and triumph, or will the game break him once again?
description.ja:
人気絶頂を誇ったゲームでもその寿命は限られている。実に15年もの歳月を一つのゲームにぶち込んだガチ勢・「淀水アムロ」は、ゲーム内で人生を賭けた一世一代の大博打に挑戦するがあえなく失敗。全てを失い気を失ったアムロが目覚めた所は、リリース初期の15年前だった。回帰前と同じ轍は踏まないと誓うアムロ。全てを知り尽くしたソシャゲ廃人は、最強のニュービーとして蘇る！

description.en:
Ye QiaoWen, an older sister-childhood-neighbor of our protagonist whom he has always admired has just recently moved back.

But Deng XianHe, the protagonist, has just recently learned that she already has someone else in her heart — a fact that suffers Deng XianHe greatly.

Suddenly seeing his usually bright and capable older sister turn into someone who is always hesitant and confused, Deng XianHe chose to suppress his years-long feelings of love, anguish, and longing.
description.ja:
隣に住んでいた憧れのお姉さん・葉巧玟（イエチャオウェン）がこの町に戻ってきて、なし崩し的に高校生の僕・鄧賢和（ドンシアンホー）と同居することに。いつも颯爽としていてなんでもできる巧姉（チャオねえ）のはずが、僕の前では間抜けで優柔不断でダメダメな社会人だった!? さらに、バイト先で知りあったカッコいい先輩と、素直で明るい同級生。僕を囲む3人の女子はそれぞれが悩みを抱えていて……。楽しくもほろ苦い青春ドラマの幕が上がる!!

---

description.pt-br:
Ye Qiao Wen, uma velha companheira, vizinha de infância de nosso protagonista, a quem ele sempre admirou, mudou-se recentemente.

Mas Deng Xian He, o protagonista, descobriu recentemente que ela já tem outra pessoa em seu coração - um fato que o deixa muito magoado.

De repente, ao ver sua velha companheira, geralmente brilhante e capaz, se transformar em alguém sempre hesitante e confuso, Deng Xian He optou por reprimir seus sentimentos de amor, angústia e saudade que já duravam anos.
description.zh-hk: 從小憧憬的鄰居大姐姐葉巧玟最近搬回來了，但少年鄧賢和卻得知她心中另有所屬的消息，澆熄了鄧賢和多年來的思念。看見平常精明幹練的大姐姐，在自己面前卻變成迷糊、做事猶豫不決的迷茫社會人，少年隱忍着失戀的情緒，第一次想對她發出怒吼，卻還是同

altTitles.ja: 少年のアビス

description.en:
In a town with nothing, in the middle of a daily life with seemingly no signs of change, high schooler Reiji Kurose was "just" living. Family, dreams for the future, childhood friends were all binding him down to that city. He thought he would "just" keep on living like that.

Until he met her.

Is there hope in living? Is there light waiting ahead?

It's the start of a boy meets girl series which reflects the "now."
description.fr:
Dans une ville vide, au milieu d'une vie quotidienne répétitive, Reiji Kurose, lycéen, ne faisait que " vivre". 
Sa famille, ses rêves d'avenir, ses amis d'enfance. Tous ces éléments le liaient à cette ville. 
Il pensait qu'il continuerait "juste" à vivre jusqu'à la fin, jusqu'à ce qu'il la rencontre. 
Y a-t-il de l'espoir dans la vie ? Y a-t-il de la lumière dans l'avenir ? 
C'est le début d'une série de rencontres entre garçons et filles qui reflète le présent!
description.ru: В пустом городке, в разгаре своей повседневной жизни, казалось бы, "просто" жил старшеклассник Рэйдзи Куросе. Семья, мечты о будущем, друзья детства - все это привязывало его к своему родному городу. Он думал, что будет продолжать так жить и никогда ничего не изменит. Пока он не встретил ту самую. Есть ли надежда в жизни? Есть ли впереди свет? Это начало серии "мальчик, повстречавший девочку", которая отражает "сейчас".
description.tr: Reiji Kurose, hiçbir şeyin olmadığı ve görünüşe bakılırsa hiçbir değişimin de olmayacağı bir kasabada ot gibi yaşıyordu. Ailesi, gelecek hayalleri ve çocukluk arkadaşları... Hepsi onu o şehre zincirliyordu. Kendince böyle yaşar giderim diyordu. Taa ki onunla tanışıncaya dek. Yaşamanın bir manası var mı? Beni bekleyen bir gelecek var mı? Oğlan ve kızın tanışmasıyla trajedi kapıları aralanır...
description.vi: Một bộ truyện đầy u ám cùng tác giả với Hatsukoi Zombie. Trong một thị trấn nhàm chán và ngày qua ngày không có gì thay đổi, Reiji Kurose, một học sinh trung học vốn luôn "sống" như "đã chết". Gia đình, tương lai, bạn thời thơ ấu. Tất cả đều trói buộc cậu vào thị trấn này. Cậu luôn nghĩ bản thân đã "chết" cho đến khi gặp được cô gái ấy. Hy vọng nào thắp sáng cho cuộc đời tăm tối của hai người? câu chuyện về hành trình tìm đến "cái chết" để được "sống" chính thức bắt đầu.

altTitles.ja: 異能力者エスティオ

description.en:
"Are you the one who called me…?"

A black-haired beast looked at him with glowing yellow eyes.

"It’s okay. It won't hurt anymore. You'll be okay."

Estio was born as the youngest son of a farmer, but everyone hated him. He was a child who could read the hearts of people and animals. And…

"A cursed child."

He finally turned 19, and it was now time for his coming-of-age ceremony. Now starts Estio's journey to find happiness.

---
Estio is just an ordinary farmer's son, but with an extraordinary ability-he can read the thoughts and memories of humans and animals. For this, he is shunned by the people in his village, finding happiness only in his animal friends. After years of silently enduring the villagers' hostility, Estio runs away the night he turns 19. His journey brings unexpected friendships and encounters, but will such bonds be able to show him there is more to him and his ability than meets the eye?

---
**Original Webtoon:** [Daum](https://webtoon.kakao.com/content/%EC%97%90%EC%8A%A4%ED%8B%B0%EC%98%A4/2761), [KakaoPage](https://page.kakao.com/home?seriesId=58509736)

**Official Translations:**
* [English](https://tapas.io/series/estio/info)
* [Japanese / 日本語](https://piccoma.com/web/product/96041)
description.fr:
«Es-tu celui qui m'a appelé...?»

Une bête aux cheveux noirs l'a regardé avec des yeux jaunes brillants.

«Tout va bien. Ça ne fera plus mal. Tu vas t'en sortir.»

Éstio est né comme le plus jeune fils d'un fermier, mais tout le monde le détestait. C'était un enfant qui pouvait lire dans le cœur des gens et des animaux. Et...

«Un enfant maudit.»

Il a finalement eu 19 ans, et c'est maintenant le moment de sa cérémonie de passage à l'âge adulte. Maintenant commence le voyage d'Éstio pour trouver le bonheur.

---
**Original Webtoon:** [Daum](https://webtoon.kakao.com/content/%EC%97%90%EC%8A%A4%ED%8B%B0%EC%98%A4/2761), [KakaoPage](https://page.kakao.com/home?seriesId=58509736)

**Official Translations:**

* [Japanese / 日本語](https://piccoma.com/web/product/96041)
description.ko:
"날 부른 게... 당신입니까?"
까만 털의 짐승이 노랗게 빛나는 눈으로 그를 올려다보았다.
"이제 괜찮습니다. 더는 아프지 않을 겁니다. 괜찮으니까."

농가의 막내 아들로 태어난 소년 에스티오.
하지만 모든 사람들은 그를 미워했다.
사람과 동물들의 마음을 읽는 아이.
그리고...

"저주 받은 아이"

마침내 열아홉 살을 맞이한 성년식.
행복을 찾기 위한 에스티오의 여정이 지금 시작된다.

—

공든탑 작가님의 웹소설 인기작 <에스티오> 본격 웹툰화!
사람과 동물의 마음을 치유하는 여스티오의 여정에 함께 하세요!

---
**Original Webtoon:** [Daum](https://webtoon.kakao.com/content/%EC%97%90%EC%8A%A4%ED%8B%B0%EC%98%A4/2761), [KakaoPage](https://page.kakao.com/home?seriesId=58509736)

description.ru:
«Это ты звал меня?» Черношёрстный зверь смотрел на него снизу своими жёлтыми сияющими глазами. «Теперь всё хорошо. Больше не будет больно. Поэтому всё хорошо». Эстио – младший сын, рождённый в семье фермера. Но все люди его презирали. Он ребёнок, который читает души животных и людей. И… «Ребёнок, получивший проклятие». Наконец, церемония взросления, которая проводится, как только человеку исполняется 19 лет. И вот Эстио отправляется в путешествие, чтобы обрести своё счастье. По мотивам веб-романа известного писателя Кон Дынтхапа.

No entanto, Touka foi o único com a classificação mais baixa: Rank-E - um status extremamente baixo em comparação com seus colegas de classe. description.en:
There are six members of the boy's ping pong club. Two are relatively normal; however, the other four consist of an aspiring sexual deviant, two perverts, and a guy with lethal B.O. Add in a cantakerous girl as a manager, and you have the entire crew.  
  
This series pushes the boundaries of good taste beyond anything the western world has experienced, yet somehow manages to remain vaguely charming. The antics of the ping pong club includes one member's trademark "Protruding Pecker Serve," molesting cross-dressing members, and the infamous "Turtle Sequence," which is much too horrifying to describe.  
  
In 1996, this manga won the Kodansha Manga Award for general manga.

description.en:
Why torment scumbags for just a moment when you can do so forever? Join Su LuXia as she transmigrates into countless worlds with her ‘Supporting Female Character’s Counterattack System’ to unleash vengeance upon the deplorable male and female leads using a variety of tactics! 

Su LuXia: "The only thing that brings me comfort is the tears of remorse from scumbag men and the agonizing groans of despicable women who can't get what they want." 

System: "Has My Esteemed Host learnt to reel back her vengeful spirit? Nope, I guess not."
description.fr:
Su Lüxia fait partie d'un "Système de rôle féminin".
Sa mission : en se téléportant dans les corps des femmes trompées et bafouées, elle renverse leur destinée.
"Seules les larmes d'un bâtard de tricheur et les gémissements de douleur d'une garce m'apportent le réconfort."
description.it:
Schiacciare un verme per un solo momento dà una soddisfazione momentanea, ma le vite passate a schiacciare i vermi forniscono vite di soddisfazione continua. Su Lüxia, la nostra protagonista femminile, trasmigra in altri mondi con il sistema di contrattacco della seconda protagonista femminile; usa schemi e trucchi elaborati per picchiare innumerevoli bastardi traditori e puttane.

Su Lüxia: "Solo le lacrime di rimorso di un bastardo traditore, e i gemiti di dolore di una puttana incapace di ottenere ciò che vuole, mi danno conforto."

Sistema: "Il mio ospite ha attinto alla sua umanità oggi? No."

主人公を拾ったら夫ができました

altTitles.zh: 捡到了男主，多了个老公

altTitles.zh-hk: 撿到了男主，多了個老公

description.en:
Her family used all their money for her extravagance and luxuries and brought a crisis of bankruptcy. While trying to figure out how to pay off their debts, she found a leaflet from the duke looking for a lost child. The reward is so much money that she could play and eat even after she payed off her debts! Following the memories of reading this book, right away, Lizelle picked up the boy who was caught in a trash dump in a poor village. She took the lost Lapel and went to the duke.

"This is the child the Duke is looking for."

Duke Chester said, looking at me with a doubtful glaze, "I need confirmation, so you should stay with my nephew in this house for the time being."

The strange cohabitation of the three people started like that. However, Lapel keeps thinking of her as a mother and won't let her leave.

"Let's get married."

Lizelle was startled by the unexpected words, "Are you insane? Did you drink?"

"One year. If you perform a contract marriage for one year, I will pay you ten times the amount of the rewards you were given."

"Can I call you 'honey'?"

And the contract marriage and marital life began. But why are his eyes constantly changing? Why do you keep coming every night!

---
Notorious for her extravagant spending, Wilhazelle Fossier drove her house to complete financial ruin. To pay her family's debt, she resolves to collect a bounty from the wealthy Duke Heillos by finding his missing nephew. Although her search is successful, until the skeptical duke can confirm the young boy's identity, Wilhazelle must spend one month living at the Heillos manor. But when one month turns into one year and a contract marriage, she starts to wonder if the money is worth it!

description.fr:
Sa famille a utilisé tous leurs argents pour des extravagances et du luxe, ce qui a provoqué leur faillite… Alors qu'elle essayait de rembourser leurs dettes, elle trouvât un prospectus du Duc qui recherchait un enfant perdu. La récompense était si généreuse qu'avec ça, ils pourraient vivre confortablement même après avoir remboursé leurs dettes! Suite aux souvenirs de la lecture de ce livre, tout de suite, Lizelle retrouva le garçon qui était coincé dans un pauvre village. Elle le prit donc avec elle, afin de toucher la récompense. «C'est l'enfant que le duc recherche.» Le duc Chester étant dubitatif, il l'obligea à rester avec l'enfant dans sa demeure le temps de prouver que cet enfant est bien le sien. L'étrange cohabitation de ces trois personnes commença alors comme ça…

description.id:
Hobi berfoya-foya Lizelle membuat keluarganya terjerat utang di lintah darah. Sialnya, aku merasuk ke dalam tubuhnya setelah semuanya telanjur kacau! Lalu, aku melihat pengumuman anak hilang beserta imbalannya... Aku tahu siapa dan di mana dia! Raphelion Heillos—si tokoh utama tampan, hebat, dari keluarga Duke, dan yang jelas sekarang dia... masih ada di tempat pembuangan sampah! Aku akan memulangkannya, dapat imbalan, bayar utang, dan hidup makmur sebagai bangsawan! Sayangnya, rencana simpel itu dikacaukan Chester Heillos—paman Raphelion.

description.ko:
'허영심에 가득 찬 웨르아젤 프로시에' 

그것이 내 별명이었다.
정확히 말하자면 내가 빙의하기 전 웨르아젤의 별명.
웨르아젤 진 빚을 수습하기 위해 백방으로 돈을 구할 방법을 찾던 도중!
공작가에서 잃어버린 아이를 찾는다는 전단지를 발견했다.

사례금은 빚을 청산하고도 펑펑 쓸 수 있는 돈.
냉큼 원작 남주인 아이를 주워 공작 가에 데리고 왔는데…

“이 아이가 라펠리온이라는 걸 어떻게 확신합니까.”

공작이 나를 사기꾼으로 취급하는 것으로 모자라,

“한 달 동안 이 저택에서 함께 지내시죠.”

당장 사기가 아니라는 증명을 할 수 없으니
한 달 동안 같이 지내잔다.

그런데!

“결혼하죠.
 딱 1년 동안만 계약 결혼을 해주면 사례금의 10배를 얹어 주죠.”

이제는 나한테 결혼까지 하잰다.

“여보라고 부르면 될까요?”

일 년 동안만 결혼한다면 사례금의 열배를 준다는데 당연히 승낙해야지!
그렇게 시작된 일 년 동안의 계약 결혼.

그런데 왜 자꾸 눈빛이 낯뜨겁게 변하는 건데?
왜 자꾸 밤마다 찾아오는 건데?

---

description.ru:
Ее семья жила на широкую руку и в скором времени обанкротились. Пытаясь придумать, как расплатиться с долгами, она нашла листовку от герцога, который искал потерявшегося ребенка. Награда - столько денег, что можно играть и есть даже после выплаты долгов! По воспоминаниям о прочтении этой книги, Лизель сразу же нашла мальчика, деревенской свалке. Она взяла потерянного Лапеля и пошла к герцогу. Так началось странное сожительство трех людей. Однако Лапель продолжает думать обо мне как о матери и не хочет ее оставлять. "Давай поженимся". Лизель была поражена неожиданными словами. "Ты с ума сошел? Ты пил?" "1 год. Если ты заключишь контрактный брак на один год, я заплачу тебе 10-кратную сумму вознаграждения". Так начался брак по контракту и супружеская жизнь. Но почему мои глаза постоянно меняются? Почему ты продолжаешь приходить каждую ночь!

description.uk:
Сім'я Лізель звикла жити на широку руку і незабаром збанкрутували. Намагаючись придумати, як розплатитися з боргами, вона знаходить листівку від герцога, що шукав втрачену дитину. Нагорода - стільки грошей, що можна знову поживати навіть після виплати боргів! За спогадами із прочитаної книги Лізель одразу ж знаходить хлопчика на сільському звалищі. Однак знайдений, Лапель, продовжує думати про неї як про матір і не хоче розлучатися.

"Якщо ти укладеш зі мною фіктивний шлюб на один рік, я заплачу тобі десятиразову суму винагороди".

Так розпочався шлюб за контрактом та подружнє життя. Але з чого раптом такі зміни? Чому ти продовжуєш приходити щоночі?!

description.zh-hk:
‘虛榮心滿滿的韋爾阿澤爾·普羅西耶’，這是我的別名。準確來說，這是我穿越之前，韋爾阿澤爾的別名。
為了替韋爾阿澤爾還債，我千方百計尋找掙錢的辦法！這時我發現了公爵家尋找丟失的孩子的告示。
而高額的報酬足夠將債務還清。撿到原作中的男主後本想帶到公爵家…“你怎麼就確信這孩子是拉菲利翁。”
公爵不僅把我當成騙子，還對我說“你就在這裡住一個月吧。”無法立刻證明我不是個騙子，我只好同意了。
可是！ “我們結婚吧。只要和我契約結婚一年，我就給你十倍報酬。”現在他竟然讓我和他結婚。
“我可以叫你老婆嗎？”他說過只要結婚一年，就會給我十倍報酬，我當然沒法拒絕啊。
就這樣我們開始了為期一年的契約婚姻。可是為什麼感覺他的目光變得灼熱？為什麼總是夜裡來找我？

---

altTitles.ja: アオのハコ

description.en:
Taiki Inomata is on the boys' badminton team at sports powerhouse Eimei Junior and Senior High. He's in love with basketball player Chinatsu Kano, the older girl he trains alongside every morning in the gym. One Spring day, their relationship takes a sharp turn ... And thus begins this brand-new series of love, sports and youth!

---
Official Release:
- Indonesian release by Elex Media (2023)
description.fr:
Taiki Inomata, membre du club de badminton, a eu le coup de foudre pour Chinatsu Kano, la star du club de basket de son établissement. Il s'entraîne à ses côtés tous les matins. Sa relation avec Chinatsu va prendre un tournant totalement inédit lorsqu'un jour de printemps, une nouvelle des plus déconcertantes va lui offrir une opportunité inespérée de conquérir sa belle.

---

Maison d'édition FR : **Delcourt/Tonkam**
description.tl: Si Taiki Inomata ay nasa boys' badminton team na sports powerhouse ng Eimei Junior at Senior High. In love siya sa basketball player na si Chinatsu Kano, ang babaeng mas matanda sa kaniya na kasama niya magpraktis kada umaga sa gym. Isang araw, ang kanilang relasyon ay biglang nagbago.
description.uk:
Тайкі Іномата — учасник команди з бадмінтону, який вчиться у школі Еймей. Щодня він намагається прийти до школи якомога раніше, але його завжди випереджає Чінацу Кано, в яку він закоханий.

Чінацу — зірка команди з баскетболу. Хоч Тайкі добре грає в бадмінтон, він далеко не настільки популярний, як Чінацу, що робить шанси на взаємну симпатію низькими. Але за дивним поворотом долі Чінацу починає жити в його будинку.
description.vi:
Taiki Inomata, năm ba sơ trung, là thành viên của đội cầu lông. Kể từ khi tập luyện cùng với đội cầu lông, cậu luôn cố đến sớm nhất có thể, thế nhưng, cậu chỉ là người thứ hai đến nhà đa năng. Bởi vì người đầu tiên luôn đến sớm nhất, chính là Chinatsu Kano, năm nhất cao trung, và là người mà cậu thích.

Vì sự chênh lệch giữa mức độ nổi tiếng mà cậu cảm thấy mình không thể kéo gần khoảng cách với cô ấy. Thế nhưng...

Vào một ngày đẹp trời, vì chuyện gia đình, Chinatsu Kano đã đến sống chung với Taiki Inomata.

Với cơ hội ngàn năm có một này, với cái flag romcom to hơn núi Phú Sĩ này, liệu rằng cậu chàng Taiki có thể làm nên chuyện hay không?
description.es-la: Taiki Inomata forma parte del equipo masculino de bádminton en el prestigioso instituto deportivo Eimei Junior y Senior High. Su corazón late por Chinatsu Kano, la hábil jugadora de baloncesto con la que comparte entrenamientos matutinos en el gimnasio. En un día primaveral, su relación da un giro sorprendente… Y así se inicia esta nueva serie que combina amor, deportes y la efervescencia de la juventud.
description.pt-br: Taiki Inomata está na equipe de Badminton dos meninos na Powerhouse Esportiva Eimei Junior e Senior High. Ele está apaixonado por jogador de basquete Chinatsu Kano, a menina mais velha que ele treina ao lado de todas as manhãs no ginásio. Um dia de primavera, seu relacionamento tem uma virada acentuada ... e assim começa esta nova série de amor, esportes e jovens!

description.en: This is a girls love series. When a delinquent and a role model student start dating, they must conceal their relationship because of their reputations. People would be outraged and not approve of such a couple. Even though Alix and Skip are complete opposites like night and day, they manage to maintain a loving relationship.

"You’re the first one… that can feel my presence…"
"What the… You look cute even though it's just a dream…"
Under the influence of his shaman father, Jinhyuk has the ability to sense non-human entities. Furthermore, the fairy who is in love with Jinhyuk hangs around him, pulls pranks on him, and, with the help of a succubus, enters his dreams. With his pure intentions, the fairy thought, "I will only meet him once." Instead, the brief meeting made his affections for him become stronger. Every night, Jinhyuk has a dream in which the fairy appears; unlike the ghosts he had seen as a child, the fairy appears to be harmless. What starts as pure curiosity turns into a flirtatious encounter, and the two are drawn into a sweet, creamy dream… 
A dream as fresh as milk and as sweet as cream!
description.fr:
"Tu es le premier ... à pouvoir sentir ma présence ... !"
"Qu'est-ce que ... Tu es mignon même si ce n'est qu'un rêve ... "
Grâce à son père chaman, Jinhyuk peut sentir la présence de créatures non-humaines.
Une fée ayant eu le coup de foudre après sa rencontre avec Jinhyuk, lui tourne autour et lui fait des farces, et avec l'aide d'une succube, entre dans les rêves de Jinhyuk.
Avec ses intentions pures, la fée pensait : "J'aimerais le rencontrer juste une fois ! », mais au lieu de cela, cette brève rencontre n'a fait que renforcer ses sentiments pour lui. Chaque nuit, la fée lui rend visite dans ses rêves. Contrairement aux fantômes qu'il avait croisés étant plus jeune, la fée semblait inoffensive. Et même mignonne comparée aux fantômes de son enfance.
Ce qui n'était au départ qu'une simple curiosité s'est transformé en une séduisante rencontre, où tous deux sont entraînés dans un rêve doux et crémeux ...
Un rêve aussi frais que le lait et aussi doux que la crème !
description.tr: Şaman babası sayesinde insan olmayan varlıkları hissetme yeteneğine sahip olan Jinhyuk, şakacı ve meraklı peri Doey'nin ona aşık olup rüyalarına girmeye başlamasıyla şaşkına döner. Masum ve zararsız bir şaka olarak başlayan şey, hızla samimiyete dönüşerek rüya ve gerçek arasındaki çizgiyi bulanıklaştırır. Aralarındaki bağ derinleştikçe Jinhyuk'un başlangıçtaki çekingenliği, Doey'nin büyüleyici varlığına karşı içini kavuran bir özleme dönüşür. Birlikte, süt kadar taze ve krema kadar tatlı olan rüyalarda, aşk karmaşası ile gezinerek tuhaf ve romantik bir yolculuğa çıkarlar.

altTitles.ja: バットマン ジャスティスバスター

description.en: Batman Justice Buster is the title of the new manga that the publisher Kodansha has dedicated to Batman and the first title of a renewed collaboration between the Japanese publisher and DC.

altTitles.ja: エデンズ ゼロ

description.en:
Shiki is a human who lives in a city filled with only robots. He considers the robots to be his best friends, and always takes care of them. Then, one day, he comes across another human - Rebecca, a girl who makes videos online to become popular. And at the same time, the robots start to go crazy?   
   
A new manga from Hiro Mashima, of [*Rave Master*](<https://mangadex.org/manga/1036>) and [*Fairy Tail*](<https://mangadex.org/manga/558>) fame.
description.ru: Она явит читателям абсолютно новую форму фэнтези. Там будет куча довольно-таки вызывающих шуток. Никакой связи с Хвостом новинка иметь не будет. В ней появится Плу из манги Rave Master.
description.tr:
İnsanların terk ettiği bir tema parkı olan Granbell Krallığı'nda artık robotlar yaşamaktadır. Robotların yanı sıra onlarla birlikte yaşamını sürdüren tek bir insan vardır: Shiki. Ömrünü sürekli bu makinelerle beraber yaşasa da günün birinde Rebecca ve kedisi Happy, bu tema parkına gelirler. Yeni ziyaretçilerin bilmediği ise Granbell'in yüzyıllar içerisindeki ilk konukları olduklarıydı. Shiki yeni arkadaşlar edinme yolunda tökezlerken robotlar bir ayaklanma başlatırlar. Doğup büyüdüğü yer artık çok tehlikeli bir hâle gelince Shiki, Rebecca ve Happy'nin uzay gemisine katılır ve uçsuz buçaksız bir uzay macerası başlar.

 [**Rave Master**](https://mangadex.org/title/5923081c-ad82-4a8b-a509-89ebe752db01) ve [**Fairy Tail**](https://mangadex.org/title/227e3f72-863f-46f9-bafe-c43104ca29ee) ile tanınan Hiro Mashima'nın yeni serisi.

altTitles.th: ใต้ร่มวันฝนพรำ

description.en:
Sisters Ju-eun and Hye-jin lived a miserable life. After the death of their mother, their 'father', who had always been absent from their lives, suddenly appeared. Hye-jin, the older sister, agreed to his suggestion: if one of them joins the 'Daesung Group', he will rescue them from their poverty-stricken life. However... three years after entering 'Daesung Group', she dies in vain. This left Ju-eun struggling with despair at her helplessness in preventing her sister’s death. But then, she gets a new opportunity when she is brought back in time and Ju-eun decides to take her sister's place by becoming the daughter of the 'Daesung Group' that killed Hye-jin.

---
Sisters Ju-eun and Hyejin grew up in absolute poverty. After their mother’s death, Hyejin accepts the offer to join their estranged father’s wealthy family. But when Hyejin turns out dead just three years later, Ju-eun is grief-stricken. She grabs at the chance to travel back in time and take her sister’s place where she meets the kind but mysterious Iho.

description.en:
All of a sudden, Miko is able to see grotesque monsters all around her; but no one else can. Rather than trying to run away or face them, she instead musters all of her courage and… ignores them. Join in on her day-to-day life as she keeps up her best poker face despite the supernatural goings-on.
___
[Alt Raw (niconico Manga)](http://seiga.nicovideo.jp/comic/37662)
description.ru: Мико — старшеклассница, проклятая шестым чувством; у нее есть способность видеть призраков- Она пытается жить обычной жизнью, но трудно, когда призраки продолжают преследовать ее- Она также может видеть души людей, и она понимает, что люди — настоящие монстры.В один «прекрасный» день старшеклассница внезапно начала видеть призраков! Она не может от этого избавиться, но изо всех сил старается вести себя так, будто вообще их не видит. История девушки с шестым чувством начинается!

altTitles.ja: 恐怖

description.en:
Following the life of the student newspaper reporter Emiko, these are scary stories of experiences from Miyako High School :  
- Ubawareta Shinzou (Stolen Heart) – The school's mystery club sees the dangerous consequences of an innocent promise concerning heart donation after death between two friends.   
- Kyuuketsu Men (Bloodsucking Mask) – A girl who wears a demon mask from a shrine for a bad-luck-banishing drama club party ends up unable to remove it.   
- Dokuga (Poison Moth) – The science club leader creates a serum to preserve dead bodies perfectly, but it may have other unpredicted side effects.   
- Henshitsu – A couple take shelter from a storm in a strange house with a secret that might prove to be deadly.   
– These stories and many more are found in the two volumes of Kyoufu. [tethysdust]

description.en:
Princess Llewelyn, who was once an outstanding princess but was now miserably abandoned. An ugly curse has been placed upon her with no one to protect her. It is a curse that makes her lust for men. In order to stop her curse, Llewelyn opens her bedroom... Four men are entangled with the abandoned princess. Will the truth of the curse be revealed? And who will be the man who will end up with her?

---

* Naver changed the webtoon's rating from R15 to R19. The novel is still R15, it has never released as R19. Naver R19 rating for the webtoon is more of a mature R17.

description.fr:
La princesse Lewellyn avait tout pour elle. Jusqu'au jour où sa mère s'est fait exécuter pour avoir tenté de maudire le prince héritier. Depuis, elle vit ses jours délaissée par les siens et harcelée par la reine douairière. Elle ne rêve plus que de pouvoir entrer à l'abbaye pour s'échapper du palais et vivre une vie chaste. Mais le dieu démon Asmodeus lui a infligé la malédiction de la luxure, la faisant plonger dans le désir. Parviendra-t-elle à cacher ses ébats de princesse lubrique et à se rappeler de l'homme qui a pris sa virginité?

title.en: She Who Doesn't Say Anything Good

description.en: A sweet, savage, action romance between a gangster and a vampire girl…! Jung Chung-Oh, he is a tyrant that wipes out the entire enemy all by himself. One day, he gets assigned to protect a girl. Baek I-Do, she is the girl that is protected by the chairman of the TaeReam group. She was – “I’m more into being a predator, than being a prey.” – A vampire. “I’m pleased to meet you. My name is Jung Chung-Oh.” Will Ido happen to be a saviour, or hell to Jung Chung-Oh, who is trying to stay alive for a bloodthirsty revenge.

title.en: Otaku mo Koi mo Rensa suru

description.en:
Kakoi Yuzuru, who sits next to me, has a pretty face.
But she has an incredibly handsome boyfriend, Kawai Chihiro-kun.
And I, Otonari Wataru...
am living a rosy high school life just shipping those two!
--centered around the disappointing but beautiful nerd Otonari-kun.
This is a non-stop fanboying school love comedy!

title.en: Ochikobore Kenshi, Tsuihousareta no de Majutsushi ni Tenkou suru - Kenshi no Toki wa Gomi Skill datta "Zettai Kioku" wa Majutsushi ni Totte wa Kami Skill deshita

altTitles.en: The Exiled Failed Swordsman Becomes a Sorcerer ~ [Absolute Memory], Which Was a Garbage Skill for a Swordsman, Is a God Skill for a Sorcerer!

description.en: In a world where swordsmanship and magic clash, Durandal is born into one of the world’s most prestigious swordsman families. However, his innate skill is ‘Absolute Memory’. A skill that allows him to never forget anything he has seen or heard, but it was completely useless in swordsmanship where power is everything. Eventually, the banished Durandal encounters ‘magic’, and starts to change the life he had once given up on!!

altTitles.en: The Meals Of A Single Woman (26) At Her Limit
The Suffering of a 26 Year Old Unloved Female Doomer

El sufrimiento de una Doomer no amada de 26 años

description.en: Daily life of a 26 year old NEET with a bombastic bod
description.ja:
鬱、孤独、たまに飯。
仕事につかれ、生活につかれた限界独身女子の柊さん。どんなに憂鬱でも、おなかだけは空いてしまうようです。
description.vi: Cuộc sống hằng ngày cùng những bữa ăn đạm bạc của bà chị độc thân thất nghiệp chán đời.
description.es-la: La Sr. Hiiragi, es una chica marginalmente soltera que está cansada del trabajo y la vida. No importa cuán deprimido esté, mi estómago parece estar vacío.

altTitles.ja: 異世界ウォーキング

description.en:
Sora, a Japanese boy who was summoned to another world, gained the skill "Walking." Its effect is that "no matter how much he walks, he never gets tired." Because of this weak skill, the king expelled him from the group of summoned heroes. But when Sora starts walking in another world, he suddenly levels up!
 
Walking had a hidden effect of "gaining 1 EXP for each step taken." He acquired useful skills such as 'Appraisal,' 'Alchemy,' and healing magic...

Getting one skill after another, he became talented just by walking! The adventure to encounter and touch the unknown is about to begin!
description.pt-br:
Sora, um garoto japonês que foi convocado para outro mundo, ganhou a habilidade “Caminhar”. Seu efeito é que “não importa o quanto ande, ele nunca se cansa”. Por causa dessa habilidade fraca, o rei o expulsou do grupo de heróis convocados. Mas quando Sora começa a andar em outro mundo, ele subitamente sobe de nível!

Caminhar tinha um efeito oculto de “ganhar 1 EXP para cada passo dado”. Ele adquiriu habilidades úteis como 'Avaliação', 'Alquimia' e magia de cura...

Adquirindo uma habilidade após a outra, ele se tornou talentoso apenas andando! A aventura de encontrar e tocar o desconhecido está prestes a começar!

title.en: Your Scent is a Little Sweet

altTitles.en: Your Taste Is A Little Sweet

description.en: Because Tang Chao (α) had never mentally experienced the onset of secondary sexual characteristics, she had been working as a cover model as a beta. After unexpectedly having sex with an omega, she found out that she can only be close with this omega. The next day, she met her new colleague Li Zhixu, who seems to be that omega. But... isn't this Li Zhixu a beta?
description.zh: 唐朝因为心理阴影从未经历第二性征的发作，因此她一直以贝塔的身份在做平面模特。在意外与一个欧米伽经历了甜蜜后，她发现自己能够且只能够接近这位欧米伽。第二天她发现自己的新同事李之叙，似乎正是那个她？可是……这个李之叙明明是个贝塔？

altTitles.ja-ro: Meccha Shoukan Sareta Ken THE COMIC

altTitles.ja: めっちゃ召喚された件 THE COMIC

altTitles.en: Summoned to a parallel fantasy world many times

description.en:
Name’s Inori Takafuji. I’m not really much of a “go-getter,” if you catch my drift — sleep’s more my style — but getting summoned to another world kinda messed things up.

Bit hard to chill when you’ve got a king in your face telling you there’s a bad guy you’ve gotta go slay or whatever, you know? Plot twist, though — it’s actually not so bad. Getting the hero treatment sounds pretty nice, right?

But then it happens again! Some other clown summons me, I get my obligatory superpower, and off I go. And sure, that’s fine. It happens, sometimes you get isekai’d to the wrong place. But then it happens AGAIN! Someone ELSE summons me, I get ANOTHER superpower, and then I’m somewhere totally new.

Repeat ad nauseam.

No idea what’s going on, but all I want is one thing: stop !@#$ing summoning me!

title.en: Otonari no Tenshi-sama ni Itsu no Ma ni ka Dame Ningen ni Sareteita Ken

altTitles.ja: お隣の天使様にいつの間にか駄目人間にされていた件

altTitles.en: The Angel Next Door Spoils Me Rotten

altTitles.ja-ro: Otonari no Tenshi-sama ni Itsu no Ma ni ka Dame Ningen ni Sareteita Ken

altTitles.pt-br: Meu Anjo de Vizinha Me Mima Demais

description.en:
A HEAVENLY ENCOUNTER!
Mahiru is a beautiful girl whose classmates all call her an “angel.” Not only is she a star athlete with perfect grades—she’s also drop-dead gorgeous. Amane‚ an average guy and self-admitted slob‚ has never thought much of the divine beauty‚ despite attending the same school. Everything changes‚ however‚ when he happens to see Mahiru sitting alone in a park during a rainstorm. Thus begins the strange relationship between this incredibly unlikely pair!

*Adapted from the Light Novel with the same name, 
Serialized in Square Enix Web Magazine [Gangan Online](https://www.ganganonline.com/title/1480)*
description.vi: Fujimiya Amane sống một mình trong căn hộ của mình, và cô gái xinh nhất ở trường cậu, Shiina Mahiru, lại là hàng xóm của cậu. Họ hầu như chẳng bao giờ nói chuyện với nhau cho tới một ngày trời mưa cậu thấy cô không cầm theo ô và cho cô mượn. Để cảm ơn thì cô đã thường xuyên giúp anh làm việc nhà, từ đó mối quan hệ của họ bắt đầu nảy nở.
description.pt-br:
Fujimiya Amane, um estudante do ensino médio, mora sozinho em seu apartamento. Ao lado dele mora Shiina Mahiru, a garota mais bonita da escola. Alguém que todos chamam de "anjo". Eles nunca conversam de verdade, mas quando Amane empresta seu guarda-chuva a Mahiru em um dia chuvoso, o relacionamento deles começa a florescer.

Em pouco tempo Mahiru descobre que Amane negligencia sua cozinha e limpeza, e ela se sente obrigada a intervir.

Embora eles não tenham nenhum interesse um pelo outro, eles lentamente se aproximam...

Esta é a história de amor agridoce de um jovem e sua bela vizinha de língua afiada.

altTitles.ja: オーバーロード＜新＞世界編

description.en: After winning the battle of Katze Plains and founding the Sorcerer Kingdom of Ainz, they aim for a utopia of perpetual continuity and prosperity, a world where many races kneel before Ainz. As the first step toward achieving this goal, Ainz heads to the Empire to strengthen the Adventurer’s Guild and incorporate it into the state. Behind the scenes, the nations of the world are beginning to stir with their own agendas for the Sorcerer Kingdom...! Ainz's high road, once again!
description.ru:
Аинз, выигравший битву на равнинах Катце и основавший волшебную страну, стремится к утопии — миру, где многие расы вечно процветают и преклоняются перед Аинзом. В качестве первого шага на пути к достижению этой цели он направляется в Империю, чтобы укрепить Гильдию искателей приключений и включить ее в состав нации. За кулисами,
спекуляции в каждой стране вокруг волшебной страны начинают шевелиться?! Доминирование Аинза снова!

altTitles.ja: アズールレーン４コママンガ　びそくぜんしんっ！

description.en: Official 4-koma webcomic from the popular mobile game Azur Lane.

altTitles.ja: 宝石の国

description.az: Cəvahiratlar ölkəsi (Houseki no Kuni), meteoritlərin altı dəfə Yerə düşdüyü və bu prosesdə onu məhv etdiyi uzaq gələcəkdə baş verir. Demək olar ki, bütün canlılar məhv oldu, qalan bütün torpaqlar tək bir sahilə çevrildi. Çox uzun zaman dilimləri ərzində həsas həyat forması olan yeni bir irq yarandı; insan şəklini alan ölməz zinət əşyaları. Fosfofillit (Phos) zəifdir (ən aşağı sərtliklərdən birinə malikdir) və həmyaşıdları tərəfindən yararsız hesab edilir. Phos'a təbiət tarixinin ensiklopediyasını yaratmaq tapşırığı verildikdən sonra o, uzaq, lakin müdrik həmkarı Kinovarın (Cinnabar) köməyinə müraciət edir, beləliklə onların dostluğu və şəxsi inkişafı başlayır. Eyni zamanda “Cəvahirat camaatı” onun dəbdəbəli dəyərindən yararlanmaq istəyən Aydan gələnlərlə (aylılarla) müharibə aparır.
description.en: In the distant future, a new life form called Houseki (gems) are born. The 28 Houseki must fight against the moon dwellers who want to attack them and turn them into decorations, thus each gem is assigned a role such as a fighter or a medic. Though they hope to fight the moon dwellers, Phos is a gem who is given no assignment until the gems' master Adamantine asks them to write an encyclopedia.

altTitles.ja: 忘れえぬ魔女の物語

description.en:
Even if today disappears, these feelings will not.
An everyday in which nothing happens, with each day slightly different than the last.
The slightly strange story of her, and me, and our clumsy feelings.

Only I remember that there were three entrance ceremonies this year. Only I remember the unchosen days. The world, repeating 'todays' like a broken record...

"My name is Inaba Michiru. Nice to meet you."

A story about her, who befriended me the following day as well. About my first human relationship, about the gradually shrinking distance between us, and my quietly changing feelings...

A slightly strange story about a friendless, loveless me, and her, and our clumsy feelings.

altTitles.ja: キャプテンキッド

description.en: In the 19th century, there lived a young pirate king, feared enough to be called the “Devil of the Sea”. His name is Captain Kid! With his mysterious guardian sword, Black Lightning, he sails the seven seas aboard his vessel, the Golden Drake!! What awaits him? Is it hell, or the furious waves of the ocean?! The adventurous tale of Kid and his band of rogues begins here!!

altTitles.ja: 銀牙伝説WEED
銀牙伝説ウィード

description.en:
A dog named Weed happens to hear he is the son of Gin, the great leader of Ohu, who lead the dogs of Ohu to victory in a fight against the monstrous bear Akakabuto.   
Weed wants to find his father no matter what.   
On his way to find him, Weed hears that his father has been captured by a ruthless villain called Hougen.  
  
Sequel to Ginga Nagareboshi Gin.

description.ar: قرر الدوق فيريو فولوتي فجأة تبني ابنة ووجد فتاة أيضًا لمن يحبها. تدور هذه القصة حول عائلة “محبة” من أب الأغنى والأقوى والأكثر تغطرسًا في العالم، وابنته بالتبني اللطيفة الصريحة والمحبة للعضلات، وزوجة أب مع سر غريب.
description.en:
"I'm going to adopt a child."

Duke Phileo Boleoti's impulsive decision shocked everyone in the mansion. Not only did he make her his daughter, but he also gave her the name of a 'beast' that only direct members of the bloodline could receive.

"Even as you breathe right now, I'm earning money."
"It's confidence, not arrogance."
"My face really does have its advantages."
The most arrogant father in the whole world, and-

"I love muscles the most. Let's get muscular."
"Show me your thigh muscles! Your butt would be even better!"
"You're nothing but a flower if you have a calm personality…" his corrupted(?) daughter. 

And… "I will give his excellency the information he wants most."

"Information I want most, you say…"

"You won’t regret it."

…A stepmother(?) with a strange secret as well.
description.id: Duke Voreoti yang tampan adalah pria paling menakutkan di kekaisaran. Tapi suatu hari, dia ingin mengadopsi seorang anak?!
description.ko:
“아이를 입양한다”

어느 날 갑자기 떨어진 북부의 주인 보레오티의 폭탄 발언.
그리고 기적처럼 만난 “검은색”을 지닌 아이.

그런데…

“근☆육이 제일 좋아~ ☆불끈불끈☆ 모여라~ ٩(๑˃́ꇴ˂̀๑)۶”
“이두근 (ง˙∇˙)ว, 삼두근 (ง˙∇˙) ง”
“흉근 복근 짜릿해 ദ്ദി ˉ͈̀꒳ˉ͈́ )✧.”

“…주군, 저희 애들은 저 정도까지는 아니었습니다만.”

아니다. 우리 애가 얼마나 똑똑한데. 일곱 살인데 어려운 말도 많이 알고, 책도 빨리 읽고, 배짱도 있고… 너네 우리 딸이 구운 쿠키 먹어봤나? 아무튼 재능이 넘쳐난단 말이다. 우리 딸은 천재야. 얼굴도 날 닮아서 요즘 부쩍 미모가 꽃을 피우고 있지. 벌써부터 두려울 정도다. 이 내가 말이지.

……그래, 인정한다. 내 딸은 변태다.

altTitles.ja: デッドロック

description.en:
The latest series by Hiro Mashima is a Demon World Academy Dark Fantasy!!
DEAD ROCK is a demon king training institution that towers over the depths of the demon world.
Yakuto, a young demon, challenges the harsh entrance exam to knock on the doors of DEAD ROCK!!
description.fr: DEAD ROCK se déroule au sein de l'académie sombre et fantastique du même nom, un institut d'entraînement pour les rois démons qui gouvernent les abysses du monde des démons. C'est là que Yakuto, un jeune résident du monde des démons, se lance dans le défi des examens d'admission.
description.ja:
デッドロック、それは魔界の深層にそびえたつ魔王養成機関。
魔界人の若者であるヤクトは、デッドロックの門戸をたたくため、過酷な入学試験に挑む!!

Suddenly, a fleet of ships with mysterious super-weapons called the "Fleet of Fog" appeared all around the world. Humanity didn't have the technology to fight such a fleet, so they were driven out of the sea…  
Seventeen years after the battle, for some reason, Gunzou Chihaya and his crewmates aboard the I-401 and the personification (Mental Model) of the I-401, Iona, started fighting the Fleet of Fog…

description.en:
Known for the compilation *"Captivated, by You"*, Wayama’s first serialization in a Josei magazine is a comedy set in an all-girls school about a Japanese language teacher, Hoshi-sensei, and the carefree play that his students involve him in.  
  
The story starts when Kagawa, a student, delivers the class journal to Hoshi-sensei.   
  
As the students play word chain game "Shiritori" in the form of drawings in the remarks column of the journal, Hoshi-sensei becomes troubled…

---

description.en:
One day, Haruto Akihara, a high school student living alone, moves in with his classmate Rei Mikoto, an extremely beautiful girl! Rei, nicknamed the "Goddess of Ice", has a cold attitude towards Haruto, who is devoted to her, but gradually...?

A new generation of lovey-dovey live-in romantic comedy!

description.en:
As Rozemyne wakes up after almost two years she finds out that the world around her has undergone great change causing her to feel like Urashima Tarō from the Japanese fairy tale. However, there is no time for her to get acclimate to the new world as she is quickly sent off to the Royal Academy to become a true noble.   
She is presented with the difficult task of raising Ehrenfest's ranking while being surrounded by eccentric teachers and children from other duchies however she is motivated by the Royal Academy's giant library. While there are no other Archduke Candidates or members of royalty around Rozemyne commandeers the library!  
Here begins Part 4 of this biblio-fantasy as we enter the Royal Academy!
